# WatchIt App
As a track and field coach, it is important to record split times of multiple athletes during meets and practices to keep track of an athlete's progress. A classic hand stop watch is useful when track a single athlete or relay team, but when trying to keep track of multiple lap splits for multiple athletes, most stop watches require caculating intervals by hand. This becomes a time consuming burden when the athletes like to see their times quickly after completing the race. The goal of this app is to calculate and provide interval and split times in real time for multiple athletes at once. 

# Key Features
- Time multiple athletes at the same time
- View instant split and interval times
- Enter athlete names to easily distinguish between competitors when assigning times

# Installing
- To clone and run this application, you'll need Git and Node.js (which comes with npm) installed on your computer. From your command line:
- Clone this repository
$ git clone https://github.com/caldwellp/WatchIt
- Go into the repository
$ cd WatchIt
- Install dependencies
$ npm install
- Run the app
$ npx expo start
- Download 'Expo Go' application onto your mobile device then scan the npx QR code 

# How to use - Home Screen
- Press on the entry box below 'Enter number of athletes'
- Enter number on numeric keyboard then hit 'done'
- Press on 'Time Athletes'

# How to use - Athelete Screen
- Press on one of the Athlete entry boxes
- Type the athlete's name and hit 'return'
- Once all the names are typed in, press 'Enter Athletes'
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/39379110/324218951-d5f58cd4-ada2-4895-a185-7db9e0214fd4.PNG?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..p0CP7RrRBQvbicWEMOAQYNv43ZHMBN25NE0ABMOYAVo" width="200" />
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/39379110/324218996-48b9fde6-eee4-4eae-82f4-ddbe3cc2fdb2.PNG?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..qn63fYHGN6BN5VKcwl8O5vLh8SISNBczWuT4QVJaPTo" width="200" />

# How to use - Timer Screen
- Press 'Start' to start timer
- Once the timer is running, pressing on an Athlete's name box will add a split time and interval calculation to their list
- Press 'Stop' to stop timer
- To reset the athletes, press "Athletes" at top left to go back
